weld.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to join metals by melting their edges and pressing them together when they are hot
weld.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The new handle will have to be welded on.
weld.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to join or unite people into a single strong group
weld.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: His job is now to weld the players into a single team.
weld.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a joint that is made by welding two pieces of metal together
